memories.content: Found that PR #3 was recently merged, adding Claude GitHub Actions workflows. No currently open PRs found. The recent commits show GitHub Actions setup for automated code review and PR assistance.

Just completed comprehensive testing setup for RoboRail Assistant UI variants. Successfully created:

1. **Test Infrastructure:**
   - Playwright configuration with multiple browsers and devices
   - Global setup/teardown with test environment initialization
   - Page Object Model with extensive test utilities
   - Mock AI models with RoboRail-specific responses

2. **Test Coverage:**
   - Basic chat functionality (send/receive messages)
   - Keyboard shortcuts (Enter, Shift+Enter)
   - Error handling and network failures
   - Resumable streams with connection interruption recovery
   - Theme system switching (3 UI variants)
   - Accessibility testing (keyboard nav, ARIA labels)
   - Mobile responsiveness
   - Performance tests (rapid messaging, long conversations)

3. **Files Created:**
   - `/tests/chat.spec.ts` - Comprehensive E2E test suite (280 lines)
   - `/tests/pages/chat-page.ts` - Page Object Model with test utilities
   - `/lib/ai/models.test.ts` - Mock AI models with controlled responses (221 lines)
   - `/playwright.config.ts` - Full configuration for multiple browsers
   - `/tests/global-setup.ts` - Test environment initialization
   - `/tests/global-teardown.ts` - Cleanup and artifact management

All three UI variants now have complete testing infrastructure following chat-sdk.dev patterns. The worktree is ready for comprehensive testing across all browsers and scenarios.

Day/night switch successfully integrated into main chat header. Now need to set HGG Professional theme as default and merge branches. Current status: ui-variants branch has all UI variants and day/night switch complete.
